org.restsql.core

Interface SqlResource


  • public interface SqlResource
    Represents an SQL Resource, a queryable and updatable database "view".
    Author:
    Mark Sawers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SqlResourceDefinition getDefinition()
      Returns SQL resource information defined by the user, including query, validated attributes and trigger.
      SqlResourceMetaData getMetaData()
      Returns meta data for SQL resource.
      String getName()
      Returns SQL resource name.
      List<Trigger> getTriggers()
      Returns triggers classes.
      List<Map<String,Object>> read(Request request)
      Executes query returning results as an object collection.
      String read(Request request, String mediaType)
      Executes query returning results as a string.
      WriteResponse write(Request request)
      Executes database write (insert, update or delete).

    • Method Detail

      • getDefinition

        SqlResourceDefinition getDefinition()
        Returns SQL resource information defined by the user, including query, validated attributes and trigger.
        Returns:
        definition

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns SQL resource name.
        Returns:
        SQL resource name

      • getMetaData

        SqlResourceMetaData getMetaData()
        Returns meta data for SQL resource.
        Returns:
        SQL rsource meta data

      • getTriggers

        List<Trigger> getTriggers()
        Returns triggers classes.
        Returns:
        list of trigger classes

      • read

        List<Map<String,Object>> read(Request request)
                              throws SqlResourceException
        Executes query returning results as an object collection.
        Parameters:
        request - Request object
        Returns:
        list of rows, where each row is a map of name-value pairs
        Throws:
        SqlResourceException - if a database access error occurs

      • read

        String read(Request request,
          String mediaType)
            throws SqlResourceException
        Executes query returning results as a string.
        Parameters:
        request - Request object
        mediaType - response format, use internet media type e.g. application/xml
        Returns:
        list of rows, where each row is a map of name-value pairs
        Throws:
        SqlResourceException - if a database access error occurs

      • write

        WriteResponse write(Request request)
                    throws SqlResourceException
        Executes database write (insert, update or delete).
        Parameters:
        request - Request object
        Returns:
        write response
        Throws:
        SqlResourceException - if the request is invalid or a database access error or trigger exception occurs
